dcterms:description: A dataset containing about 240,000 dialogue triples, suitable for studying relevance and diversity in multi-turn conversations.
dcterms:title: Movie Triples Dataset

dcterms:creator: I. V. Serban
A. Sordoni
R. Lowe
L. Charlin

Y. Bengio
dcterms:description: A dataset containing about 1.85 million conversations from the Ubuntu Relay Chat Channel, with an average of 5 utterances per conversation, suitable for training domain-specific dialogue models.
dcterms:title: Ubuntu Dialogue Dataset
